sentences.sContent: Chicken skin and gristle contain a good deal of Chondroitin Sulfate which can nourish the skin.
sentences.sContent_eng: Chicken skin and gristle contain a good deal of Chondroitin Sulfate which can nourish the skin.
sentences.sCn: 鸡皮和软骨含有大量能够滋养皮肤的硫酸软骨素。

sentences.sContent: Drinking chicken skin and gristle soup often can also delay the aging of skin.
sentences.sContent_eng: Drinking chicken skin and gristle soup often can also delay the aging of skin.
sentences.sCn: 经常喝鸡皮软骨汤能够延缓肌肤衰老。

sentences.sContent: It is defeat that turns bone to flint; it is defeat that turns gristle to muscle; it is defeat that makes men invincible. ----Henry Ward Beecher
sentences.sContent_eng: It is defeat that turns bone to flint; it is defeat that turns gristle to muscle; it is defeat that makes men invincible. ----Henry Ward Beecher
sentences.sCn: 是挫折使骨头坚如盘石；是挫折使软骨变成肌肉；是挫折使人战无不胜。

trans.tranOther: the part of meat that is not soft enough to eat
